content: After a great week of updates by @James Jones I guess @Patrick Werner and I need to flip as to who does work next week? Patrick, let me know if you have a preference. I can probably make either of the next two weeks work.
I should have some time tomorrow to squeeze a few more in (now that the publisher isn't crashing for something that I didn't change) and will make sure to fully update gForge for what we get through

I would assume everyone is following other streams, but the build isn't working right now. Lloyd is working on it. @Patrick Werner - if he gets it resolved soon, do you want to take this week and work on trackers or do you want me to? I can take this or next week. Thanks.

Hi @Kevin Power , sorry for answering with such a delay. I needed a little rest time after all the traveling. I'll be traveling again to Chile this Wednesday. I will focus on the genomics terminologies this week, so next week would be easier for me to work on tickets.
No worries, thank Patrick. I will see what I can get done this week.
FYI all - @Lloyd McKenzie has us fixed up. I had to delete "temp", "output", and in the .fhir/packages folder removing the 'current' package folder. Many thanks for getting us back up and running!
OK - I am all done with updates for this week (just in case someone is just bored out of their minds and wants to do something) :grin:
